explains: adj. 有星光的；星光照耀的

sentences.en: He stopped to try to adjust his vision to the faint starlight.
sentences.cn: 他停下来，试着使眼睛适应昏暗的星光。

sentences.en: It was starlight, and very still.
A free notebook is given with every purchase above $50 at Starlight Stationery.
sentences.cn: 在星光文具店一次购买超过五十美元的东西，将会免费获得一个笔记本。
